name: SuperTux
description: SuperTux is a game similar to the original Super Mario. In the game, the penguin Tux will be controlled to jack the bricks by jumping, then it can eat gold coins or snowballs or flowers, snowballs can make Tux grown, then Tux can shoot bullets after eating flowers.

en_US.description: SuperTux is a game similar to the original Super Mario. In the game, the penguin Tux will be controlled to jack the bricks by jumping, then it can eat gold coins or snowballs or flowers, snowballs can make Tux grown, then Tux can shoot bullets after eating flowers.
en_US.name: SuperTux

zh_CN.description: SuperTux是一款类似超级马里奥兄弟的游戏，在游戏中控制Tux企鹅通过跳起来顶砖块，吃到金币或雪球或者花，雪球可以使Tux企鹅长大，然后吃到花后可以发子弹。
zh_CN.name: SuperTux
